00031 void
00032 tsv_util_usage()
00033 {
00034   printf("tsv-util: option  filenames...\n"
00035          "    option is one of:\n"
00036          "      -linecount        prints the number of data lines in the file.\n"
00037          "      -headers          prints the headers in sorted by keys.\n"
00038          "\n"
00039          "\n");
00040 }
00041 
00042 void
00043 tsv_util_linecount(char* fname)
00044 {
00045   int rv;
00046   int data_lines;
00047   affx::TsvFile* tsv;
00048 
00049   tsv=new affx::TsvFile();
00050   rv=tsv->open(fname);
00051 
00052   printf("%-40s: ",fname);
00053   if (rv!=TSV_OK) {
00054     printf("ERR=%d\n",rv);
00055     return;
00056   }
00057 
00058   std::string str;
00059   data_lines=0;
00060   while (tsv->nextLine()==TSV_OK) {
00061     data_lines++;
00062     //tsv->get(0,0,str);
00063     //printf("%s\n",str.c_str());
00064   }
00065   printf("datalines=%d\n",data_lines);
00066   tsv->close();
00067 }
00068 
00069 void
00070 tsv_util_headers(char* fname)
00071 {
00072   int rv;
00073   affx::TsvFile* tsv;
00074   std::string key,val;
00075 
00076   tsv=new affx::TsvFile();
00077   rv=tsv->open(fname);
00078 
00079   if (rv!=TSV_OK) {
00080     printf("%s: ERR=%d\n",fname,rv);
00081     return;
00082   }
00083 
00084   tsv->headersBegin();
00085   while (tsv->headersNext(key,val)==TSV_OK) {
00086     printf("%s=%s\n",key.c_str(),val.c_str());
00087   }
00088   tsv->close();
00089 }
00090 
00092 
00093 void
00094 tsv_util_copy(char* f_file,char* t_file,int fmt)
00095 {
00096   affx::TsvFile* f_tsv=new affx::TsvFile();
00097   affx::TsvFile* t_tsv=new affx::TsvFile();
00098 
00099   //
00100   f_tsv->open(f_file);
00101   //
00102   t_tsv->copyFormat(*f_tsv); // better name?
00103   t_tsv->addHeadersFrom(*f_tsv);
00104 
00105   //
00106   if (fmt==1) {
00107     t_tsv->writeCsv(t_file);
00108   } else if (fmt==2) {
00109     t_tsv->writeTsv(t_file);
00110   } else {
00111     assert(0);
00112   }
00113 
00114   while (f_tsv->nextLine()==TSV_OK) {
00115     t_tsv->copyLevel(*f_tsv,f_tsv->line_level());
00116     t_tsv->writeLevel(f_tsv->line_level());
00117   }
00118 
00119   t_tsv->close();
00120   f_tsv->close();
00121 }
00122 
00124 int
00125 main(int argc,char* argv[])
00126 {
00127   // help?
00128   if ((argc<=1)||
00129       (strcmp("-help",argv[1])==0)||
00130       (strcmp("-h",argv[1])==0)) {
00131     tsv_util_usage();
00132     exit(0);
00133   }
00134 
00135   if ((strcmp("-linecount",argv[1])==0)||
00136       (strcmp("-l",argv[1])==0)) {
00137     int a=2;
00138     while (argv[a]!=NULL) {
00139       tsv_util_linecount(argv[a++]);
00140     }
00141     exit(0);
00142   }
00143 
00144   if (strcmp("-headers",argv[1])==0) {
00145     int a=2;
00146     while (argv[a]!=NULL) {
00147       tsv_util_headers(argv[a++]);
00148     }
00149     exit(0);
00150   }
00151 
00152   // Conversions
00153   if ((argc==4)&&(strcmp("-to-csv",argv[1])==0)) {
00154     tsv_util_copy(argv[2],argv[3],1);
00155     exit(0);
00156   }
00157   if ((argc==4)&&(strcmp("-to-tsv",argv[1])==0)) {
00158     tsv_util_copy(argv[2],argv[3],2);
00159     exit(0);
00160   }
00161 
00162   //
00163   tsv_util_usage();
00164   exit(0);
00165 }
